bonus.value: For every 10% shatter applied to a target, increase damage dealt by 4%/5%/6%/7% for 25 seconds, up to 3 stacks.
When there are 3 or more enemies around, restore HP equal to 10%/12%/13%/14% of damage dealt. The maximum HP restored per 0.5 seconds can not exceed 30%/33%/34.5%/36% of ATK.
